title: Looking to Buy T205 American Beauty's to finish subset
author: bn2cardz

posts.post_title: Looking to Buy T205 American Beauty's to finish subset
posts.post_content:
I am getting close to the finish on my t205 AB subset.  This would be my first set or subset to finish and am excited that I have so few left to go.  If you could please help me that would be appreciated.

I am looking for the following.  Please send me a price and scan.  Thank you very much.

CHANCE, FRANK
COBB, TY
EVERS, JOHN
HEMPHILL, CHARLIE
KROH, FLOYD M
MATHEWSON, CHRISTY
MERKLE, FRED
OLMSTEAD, FRED
REULBACH, EM
SCHLEI, GEORGE
Any help is appreciated.  Thank you.
Thank you to those who have helped thus far.
Updated to reflect purchases.  Thanks to those that have helped.
Still looking.  Any help would be appreciated.

Updated.
Down to just Olmstead for the Black AB subset.  It isn't an especially rare one, when I first started there were a few for sale, but I had to limit my spending and now am left with it being the last one needed.

Please help me complete this project.  If you see any at the national let me know.  Thank you.
